text: So, for ecommerce bridge, there seem to be 2 kinds of Workflows

There's workflows in Settings > Integrations > Ecommerce, one set per store; looks like you can have one for each of the three slots (First Purchase, Cart Abandoned, No Purchase in 3mo). And then of course there are workflows in Automation > Workflows.
It appears that Automation > Workflows has access to everything you'd need from Deals
So my question is: Is there an advantage to using the version in Settings > Integrations > Ecommerce over Automation > Workflows? Is there a disadvantage to *not* using it?
